data_table.description: Health/Medical History, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HHXC1
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. Did the participant report positive Rose angina in the Annual Follow-up call preceding this visit? Q1 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC2
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC2A
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Sternum (upper or middle). Q2a [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC2B
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Sternum (lower). Q2b [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC2C
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Left anterior chest. Q2c [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC2D
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Left arm. Q2d [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC2E
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Other. Q2e [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC3
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the past two months has your chest discomfort either occurred more often, lasted longer when it occurs, or come on at rest? Q3 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC4
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you had surgery on your heart, or the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for varicose veins? Q4 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC5A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF INVASIVE PROCEDURE. Coronary bypass: Q5a [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC5B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF INVASIVE PROCEDURE. Other heart procedure: Q5b [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC5C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF INVASIVE PROCEDURE. Carotid endarterectomy: Q5c [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC5D
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF INVASIVE PROCEDURE. Site: Q5d [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC5E
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF INVASIVE PROCEDURE. Other arterial revascularization: Q5e [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC5F
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF INVASIVE PROCEDURE. Other: Q5f [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC6
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart, neck, or legs? Q6 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC7A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF PROCEDURE. Angioplasty of the coronary arteries: Q7a [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC7B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF PROCEDURE. Angioplasty in the arteries of your neck: Q7b [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC7C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. PROBE FOR TYPE OF PROCEDURE. Angioplasty of lower extremity arteries: Q7c [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC8A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had: heart catheterization: Q8a [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC8B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had: carotid artery catheterization Q8b [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC8C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had: other arterial catheterization Q8c [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC9A
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed? Echocardiogram: Q9a [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC9B
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed? Electrocardiogram: Q9b [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC9C
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed? Treadmill or cardiac stress test: Q9c [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC9D
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed? Carotid ultrasound studies: Q9d [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC9E
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed? MRI exam of the brain: Q9e [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC9F
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed? CAT scan of the brain: Q9f [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC10
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. Does the participant use a wheelchair, crutches or walker? Q10 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXC11
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. Does the participant walk with a cane? Q11 [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXCFLAG
variable.description: 1= HHXC form is present [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: HHXCCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Health/Medical History, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Health/Medical History, exam 3]
